metadata.title: CVE-2024-32460 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: FreeRDP is a free implementation of the Remote Desktop Protocol. FreeRDPbased based clients using `/bpp:32` legacy `GDI` drawing path with aversion of FreeRDP prior to 3.5.0 or 2.11.6 are vulnerable to out-of-boundsread. Versions 3.5.0 and 2.11.6 patch the issue. As a workaround, usemodern drawing paths (e.g. `/rfx` or `/gfx` options). The workaroundrequires server side support.

criterions.comment: freerdp2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
